name: Racing Simulation 2: Monaco Grand Prix On-Line
overview: The ultimate racing experience: Monaco Grand Prix Racing Simulation 2 Online. Superb 3D graphics and realistic sounds for the ultimate race atmosphere. 17 circuits and 11 teams with their own cars. 5 game modes including multiplayer (2 player split-screen and online via the internet). Comprehensive set-up options, selectable weather conditions, intuitive controls. Test your skills in the toughest competition in the world.
